title: "Pixie" live wallpapers (and others live wallpapers) are broken on the AoD
content:
"Pixie" live wallpapers (and others live wallpapers) are broken on AoD, they just don't work as intended.
What should shows on the always on display shows up for just a second when i wake up the phone, like "Pixie" who should always be present on the screen.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
